entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early this afternoon. 30 percent chance of flurries over eastern sections this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:33 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 07:33 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:33 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
